s.text: The recombinant virus was purified and amplified by infecting two 10 cm dishes of Cre 8 cells using 100 ?l lysate.
Gene transfer represents a novel method for obtaining high intra-articular levels of therapeutic agents for the treatment of arthritis.

TGF-?1 has been shown to be therapeutic in several different animal models when expressed systemically from muscle tissue [ 26 27 ] . This suggests that elevated serum levels of TGF-?1 can reduce general inflammation as well as inhibit IL-1? and tumor necrosis factor alpha production, resulting in a systemic therapeutic effect.

TGF-?1 is a mutifunctional cytokine that plays an important role in immunomodulation, inflammation and tissue repair [ 6 ] . Many studies have suggested that TGF-? could be a potential therapeutic reagent for the repair of soft tissue and bone, and following ischemic injury.
